dict.acceptation: 收入，进款；进来的动作；进入；

sent.orig: This index can bethe Gross National Product, Per-Capital Income,S&P500,etc.
sent.trans: 这个指数可以用国内总产值(the Gross National Product)，人均收入(Per-Capital Income)，30种工业股票价格的道琼斯指数等等来表示。

sent.orig: Income is the most general word for money we receive from work, investments, etc.
sent.trans: 用以指从工作、投资等所得的钱，income是最通用词。

sent.orig: But these two % in high-income countries % in moderate-income countries and 30% in low-income countries.
sent.trans: 然而，这两个数字在高收入国家%，在中等收入国家%，在低收入国家30%。

sent.orig: Corporations pay income tax and must account for the income tax expense and income tax payable.
sent.trans: 公司必须交纳所得税，核算所得税费用和应缴所得税。

sent.orig: Article 1 Income tax is classified into consolidated income tax and profit-seeking enterprise income tax.
sent.trans: 第1条（所得税种类）所得税分为综合所得税及营利事业所得税。
